values: n. an occurrence in which you fail to think or act in the usual or proper way for a brief time and make a mistake 错误
n. an occurrence in which someone behaves badly or usually  a short period of time 行为失检
v. to stop for usually a brief time 终止
n.小错，疏忽,行为失检，失足,流逝,法（权利等的）失效，消失vi.退步,陷入，堕入,失效，终止,法转归
